status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window the turbine remained in **Normal Operation** for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, with **steady power output** (power_mean ≈ 0.975, very low power_std) under generally **high average winds** (wind_speed_mean ≈ 14.25 m/s, low std) but with an **isolated extreme wind spike** (wind_speed_max 43.7). Operationally, rotor speed appears **unchanging** (rotor_rpm_std = 0) while generator speed shows only **minor variation**, with **moderate pitch** (mean ≈ 9°) and **persistent yaw misalignment** (mean ≈ 9.54°). Notable anomalies include a **consistent negative power residual** (mean ≈ −0.096) aligning with the **power_deficit** tag and **elevated temperatures** (temp_mean ≈ 66.7).
